headline: What Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL)'s Waterslide Closures for Safety Upgrades Mean for Shareholders
summary: Earlier this year, Royal Caribbean Cruises temporarily closed waterslides across multiple ships for safety repairs, replacing acrylic tube parts with safer fiberglass sections following a passenger injury and subsequent fleetwide assessments. The closures, expected to extend into early 2026 and met with guest frustration over limited communication, have affected the passenger experience on various ships. We will examine how the safety-driven waterslide closures could influence Royal...
